original: @219b ` // stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
analyzed: stong chen mo rab tu joms ma sgrub thabs bzhugs

original: * // de bzhin thams cad sngar gyi cho gas stong pa nyid kyi rjes la /
analyzed: de bzhin thams cad sngar gyi cho gas stong ba nyid kyi rjes la

original: stong chan mo rab tu 'joms ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag drug pa ste /
analyzed: stong chan mo rab tu joms ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag drug ba ste

original: g-yas kyi phyag gsum na go rims bzhin du ral gri dang / mda' dang mchog sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag gsum na go rims bzhin du ral gri dang mda dang mchog sbyin ba

original: g-yon gyi phyag gsum na gzhu dang / zhags pa dang sta re'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag gsum na gzhu dang zhags ba dang sta re

original: sna tshogs pa'i cha byad can /
analyzed: sna tshogs ba cha byad can

original: na bza' dang / rgyan dang dbu rgyan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: na bza dang rgyan dang dbu rgyan dang ldan ba

original: gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan ba

original: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sgeg ba la sogs ba yon tan dang ldan ba

original: rnam bar snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: rnam ba snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can

original: sa bon brum yig las byung ba'o //
analyzed: sa bon brum yig las byung ba

original: padma dang zla ba'i 'od can mo //
analyzed: padma dang zla ba d can mo

original: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: stong chen mo rab tu joms ma sgrub thabs rdzogs
